preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

description: A study of the political, social and cultural history of  the Italian city from the late thirteenth to the early sixteenth centuries, with particular reference to the Renaissance period. Case studies will be selected from  Rome, Florence, Milan, Venice, Naples or one of the northern courts, such as Mantua or Ferrara.
